# Resist Taint (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Heroes of Horror (WotC)Â­, pg. 132

This spell grants a +4 resistance bonus on saving throws made to resist acquiring taint.
